snippet.title: Blood and Lust Trailer
snippet.description:
Fight in the arena like a Roman gladiator! Find clues and solve the murder! Romance your opponent or go on your own!
Blood and Lust is a short, free Visual Novel with LGTB content. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux on itchio and Steam!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1064140/Blood_and_Lust/
Itchio: https://ertal-games.itch.io/blood-and-lust
Website: https://www.ertalgames.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ertal77
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZUFsg9v
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ertal
